posts.content:
I don't suppose anyone has any templates for interiors they have made at home with measurements etc...!? Friend is a retired carpenter and am going to take the splitty over to him in a few weeks to set him to work but would make his life a hell of a lot easier if there were any measurements or templates for interiors people had already drafted...? Mines a 67 walkthrough and was a microbus/kombi so I want to redo it with a forward facing bench seat, 2 rear facing seats and a table which can be dropped down to bridge the gap and form a bed.

Not a major issue if not as I may get him to draw up the plans when he makes mine, just a lot more time and effort for someone who is doing me a favour! May even get him to make up 2 or 3 to sell on at a low price as everyone seems to charge a lot for them!
Guessing that's a no then!? Unless nobody uses this part of the forum!?!?

Have you looked at Bobley devon drawings? RHD or LHD
Can send all I have..
Or have you looked on vintagebus.com.... for LHD

type21f wrote:Have you looked at Bobley devon drawings? RHD or LHD
Can send all I have..
Or have you looked on vintagebus.com.... for LHD


Wow - thanks! Thats going to keep me busy for a few hours at the weekend!!!! If you have any to hand for a LHD walk through that would be fantastic but I will certainly be trawling through all of these!!!

Massively appreciated...
